title: How to Make Bisquick Mix Pancakes

steps.headline: Heat griddle or skillet over a medium-high heat.
steps.description: If you are using an electric griddle, heat to 375°F (190°C). You know it's hot enough when a few drops of water sprinkled on it sizzle and disappear.

steps.headline: Grease with cooking spray or shortening.
Whisk the ingredients together.
steps.description: Be careful not to over mix -- you still want lumps. They leaven the batter as it cooks resulting in fluffier pancakes. Over-mixing the batter will produce thin pancakes.

steps.headline: Pour just under 1/4 cupfuls onto a hot griddle.
steps.description: Cook until edges are dry and bubbles start to form on top.

steps.headline: Flip them over and cook until golden.
Finished.
steps.description: Serve with butter and syrup or whipped cream and fresh berries.
